backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing user profiles, product catalog, and order management with access control.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented features to files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of various frontend files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles and OKLCH theme variables defining light and dark mode palettes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the React app root and main module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes, theme provider, and global toaster.
Renders the VUURIX logo image with optional sizing.
frontend/src/components/design/Price.tsx: Formats bigint currency amounts into USD display text.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Page layout wrapper with header, footer, and routed content outlet.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteFoote: Footer with brand info, navigation links, social icons, and attribution.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteHeade: Responsive header with logo, navigation links, cart indicator, and mobile menu.
frontend/src/components/store/ProductCar: Displays a clickable product card with image, name, category, and price, navigating to the product detail page.
frontend/src/components/store/ProductIma: Renders a product image with fallback placeholders and error handling.
frontend/src/components/store/QuantityCo: Provides plus/minus buttons to adjust item quantity within set bounds.
frontend/src/components/system/ErrorStat: Shows an error alert with optional retry button.
frontend/src/components/system/LoadingSt: Displays a centered loading spinner with an optional message.
frontend/src/hooks/mutations/useCreateOr: Mutation hook that creates an order via the actor and invalidates the order list cache.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useOrder.ts: Fetches a single order by ID using the actor with query conditions and no retries.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useProduct.ts: Queries a single product by ID with a 5‑minute stale time.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useProducts.t: Queries the full product list with a 5‑minute stale time.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Initializes and manages the backend actor based on Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides authentication state and helpers using Internet Identity, loading identities and handling login/logout.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind setup defining light and dark theme variables and base styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/CartPage.tsx: Renders the shopping cart with item list, quantity controls, totals, and empty‑state handling.
frontend/src/pages/CheckoutPage.tsx: Implements checkout flow with authentication prompts, shipping form, order submission, and success navigation.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home page showing hero banner and a featured product grid with loading and error states.
frontend/src/pages/OrderConfirmationPage: Displays order confirmation details including items and total, with loading/error handling.
frontend/src/pages/ProductDetailPage.tsx: Product details page with image, options, quantity, and add‑to‑cart logic plus loading/error states.
frontend/src/pages/ShopPage.tsx: Shop listing page with category filtering, product grid, and loading/error UI.
frontend/src/state/cart.ts: Zustand store managing cart items, quantities, persistence, and totals.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, colors, fonts, and plugins.
project_state.json: Stores the current VUURIX project state, including versions, image needs, implemented features, and pending feature requests. Defines project metadata and planned backend models/APIs for products and orders.
